Uses of Interface
org.openide.cookies.EditorCookie

  • Packages that use EditorCookie 
    Package Description
    org.openide.cookies  
    org.openide.text
    NetBeans is able to integrate multiple editors for different content types and mechanically access their content.

    • Uses of EditorCookie in org.openide.cookies

      Subinterfaces of EditorCookie in org.openide.cookies 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  EditorCookie.Observable
      The interface extends EditorCookie and allows observing changes in state of the text document.

    • Uses of EditorCookie in org.openide.text

      Methods in org.openide.text with parameters of type EditorCookie 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static JEditorPane NbDocument.findRecentEditorPane(EditorCookie ec)
      Gets recently selected editor pane opened by editor cookie Can be called from AWT event thread only.
      static <T extends UndoableEdit>
      T      		 NbDocument.getEditToBeRedoneOfType(EditorCookie ec, Class<T> type)
      Get an edit of given type that would be redone if a redo operation would be invoked at this time for an editor cookie.
      static <T extends UndoableEdit>
      T      		 NbDocument.getEditToBeUndoneOfType(EditorCookie ec, Class<T> type)
      Get an edit of given type that would be undone if an undo operation would be invoked at this time for an editor cookie.
